body.name: Shark HP102PETBL Clean Sense Air Purifier for Home, Allergies, Pet Hair, HEPA Filter, 500 Sq Ft Small Room, Bedroom, Captures 99.98% of Particles, Pet Dander, Fur, Allergens & Odor, Portable, Midnight
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 1 hr 32 mins
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 7 hrs 17 mins
features: PERFECT FOR HOMES WITH PETS: Features an activated carbon filter to powerfully capture pet odors.
POWERFUL PURIFICATION: Pure Air Microforce uses a powerful, fast fan to deliver 4 speeds of purification based on the air quality around you.

EXCEEDS HEPA STANDARDS: Anti Allergen NANOSEAL captures more micropollutants than HEPA standards require. Trapping 99.98% of large, small, and micro sized particles (based on EST RP CC007.3, 0.1–0.2 microns). ”Allergens” refers to non living matter.
AUTOMATICALLY ADJUSTS: Clean Sense IQ tracks air quality and constantly adjusts power to maintain clean air in your home. (Measures three particle sizes: PM1, PM2.5, and PM10).
SMALL ROOM COVERAGE: Cleans up to 500 square feet based on 1 air change per hour. Perfect for smaller rooms such as bedrooms, laundry rooms, mud rooms and nurseries.
WORRY FREE ALLERGEN RELIEF: Protects your home from common air pollutants such as dust, dander, allergens and smoke. ”Allergens” refers to non living matter.
COMPACT/PORTABLE: Shark's sleek and compact design is just 6 lbs., and can fit on smaller surfaces like nightstands and desktops for portable, powerful cleaning.
FOR A GOOD NIGHT'S SLEEP: Ultra quiet performance, with dimmable lights for minimal sleep interruption.
EASY TO USE: The control panel is easy to use and displays real time air quality, filter life, fan speed, eco mode, and more.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: Shark Air Purifier Pet and Nanoseal HEPA Filter.
body.description: The Shark Air Purifier Pet uses Pure Air MicroForce to deliver fast, powerful, and quiet purification in a compact size. Clean Sense IQ senses air quality and auto-adjusts power to constantly maintain clean air in your home, while reporting results in real time. The True HEPA filter captures 99.98% of airborne particles like allergens, dust, and dander. Cleans up to 500 square feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is great! Would definitely recommend. We have dogs and this helps clear the air

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for the master Bedroom. We gave others throughout the house. It’s a quality product. I like the way that it will tell the air quality in real time. It is quiet & you can dim the light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy and worth it
reviews.reviewText: It’s quiet and does the job for our small house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the quietest air purifier I've ever heard. It also kicks on by itself when I burn things while cooking :D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my parents but testing out for them. I like it so much I want to order one for myself. I have it in a room next to my kitchen and love how reactive it is when I’m cooking. It immediately kicks on and measures the air quality totally removes the smell from pan frying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the “quick start guide,” and the machine is quiet!
reviews.reviewText: We have dogs, and I surely could have used this years ago, when we had FIVE. I bought so many little plug-in machines and spent so much on monthly filters for them, I could have bought a big bag of dog food per month with that money! Our older dogs are not with us anymore, so we have two. But if I don’t vacuum every other day, I can see all the dog hair when the sun comes streaming through the glass door! How in the world? I am really, really hoping that this air purifier will cut down on that. PLUS, we live in the Texas Hill Country, which is NOTORIOUS for cedar fever this time of year! I was shocked when we moved up here and saw a coating of yellow, on cars that sat in place for a couple days! And you should see the YouTube videos what cedar trees look like when a helicopter lowers itself close enough: LITERAL CLOUDS of yellow, billowing upward! I am happy to have this Shark air purifier, and am looking forward to cleaner air inside the living room, where my husband spends most of his time. We are senior citizens, and I want us to stay as healthy as possible.First thing I saw was the “quick start guide,” which I immediately loved—and it was not written in microscopic writing! Thank you, Shark! On the unit, I read the yellow strip, because I had to figure out how to unscrew the housing, and had to turn it upside down to remove the filter and take it out of its plastic. After reassembling, it was just a matter of plugging it in and turning it on. I decided to just put it on “auto,” because it said the machine sensed the air and adjusted accordingly. I like the indicator on the front, also, that tells you the current clean air quality in the room. Right now, it’s pretty good, because I just vacuumed and mopped yesterday. Let’s see what it does in a week. :) I recommend this, as there are so many things around us that we don’t need to be breathing, ESPECIALLY indoors!👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Set it and forget it
reviews.reviewText: I really like this air purifier. I love the fact that you can just set it on auto mode, it monitors (and displayed) air quality, and increases and decreases speed automatically as needed BASED ON air quality. It's also much quieter than many of the air purifiers that I have used that are rated for 500 sq ft. At under $200, I would call this a good buy, as well. I really love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than my other two brands.
reviews.reviewText: This Shark air purifier is quieter than my TRUSENS or Holmes brands that I have. This is the easiest to exchange the air filter also. To replace the filter, you just unscrew the bottom of the unit. The filter easily slides into the frame. I like also that I can buy aftermarket filters at a much more reasonable cost which saves money. Filters are where companies make money. The controls are easy to operate. I like how large the display is for reading air quality. This is also an attractive purifier. My purifier only came with a quick start guide, but the buttons are easy to figure out. There are temporary stickers on the outside of the air purifier that explain the buttons. The stickers look nice enough that I plan to leave them. There is a decal you can scan for more info. Pushing the gear turns off or on the air quality measurement. Pushing the auto will automaticaly adjust the fan speed according to the air quality needs. Pushing the “i” shows the particulate measurement. Pushing the picture of the cylinder with wavy lines tells the filter life left. There is a child lockout button too. This also has a color code ring that tells the air quality at a glance.
